PageWidgetPortable.Title: 1 - Identificação da Pessoa Jurídica>0007 - Outras inscrições do empresário
1 - Identificação da Pessoa Jurídica>0020 - Escrituração Descentralizada
1 - Identificação da Pessoa Jurídica>Filial do período
2 - Cadastro dos Participantes>0150 - Participantes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_PESSOAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN ( SELECT HANDLE FROM ED_PESSOAS MAXHANDLE WHERE MAXHANDLE.HANDLE IN (SELECT MAX(HANDLE) FROM ED_PESSOAS MAXPESSOA WHERE MAXPESSOA.ORIGEM = MAXHANDLE.ORIGEM AND MAXPESSOA.DATAINCLUSAO = ( SELECT MAX(PESSOA.DATAINCLUSAO) DATAINCLUSAO FROM ED_PERIODOS PERIODO JOIN ED_LANCAMENTOSCONTABEIS LANCAMENTOCONTABIL ON (LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.EMPRESA = PERIODO.EMPRESA) JOIN ED_LANCAMENTOPARTIDAS LANCAMENTOPARTIDA ON (LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.HANDLE = LANCAMENTOPARTIDA.LANCAMENTO) JOIN ED_PESSOAS PESSOA ON (PESSOA.HANDLE = LANCAMENTOPARTIDA.PARTICIPANTE) WHERE LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.DATA BETWEEN PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND PERIODO.DATAFINAL AND PESSOA.DATAINCLUSAO <= PERIODO.DATAFINAL AND PERIODO.HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) AND PESSOA.ORIGEM = MAXPESSOA.ORIGEM ) ) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3128_at7190_hs13cb7e21.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>Balancete Diário>I300 - Balancete Diário
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_BALANCETESDIARIOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.DATA >= (SELECT DATAINICIAL FROM ED_PERIODOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS)) AND A.DATA <= (SELECT DATAFINAL FROM ED_PERIODOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS)) AND A.FILIAL = (SELECT FILIAL FROM ED_PERIODOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3238_at7193_hs6e9e934f.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>I012 - Livros Auxiliares ao Diário
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes:
<SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_LIVROSAUXILIARES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (
SELECT LIVRO.HANDLE FROM ED_LIVROSAUXILIARES LIVRO JOIN ED_PERIODOS PERIODO ON LIVRO.PERIODO = PERIODO.HANDLE WHERE PERIODO.LIVRORESUMIDO = ( @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) )
)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3225_at8115_hs9fd984d7.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>I012 - Livros Auxiliares ao Diário
3 - Escrituração Contábil>I015 - Contas da Escrituração Resumida
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes:
<SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_PERIODOCONTAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (
SELECT PERIODOCONTA.HANDLE FROM ED_PERIODOCONTAS PERIODOCONTA JOIN ED_PERIODOS PERIODO ON PERIODOCONTA.PERIODO = PERIODO.HANDLE WHERE PERIODO.LIVRORESUMIDO = ( @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) )
)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3396_at8113_hsa7e5908.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>I015 - Contas da Escrituração Resumida
3 - Escrituração Contábil>Lançamentos Contábeis>I075 - Históricos Padrões
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_HISTORICOSPADROES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT MAX(HANDLE) FROM ED_HISTORICOSPADROES WHERE EMPRESA = A.EMPRESA AND CODIGO = A.CODIGO AND DATAINCLUSAO = ( SELECT MAX(DATAINCLUSAO) FROM ED_HISTORICOSPADROES WHERE EMPRESA = A.EMPRESA AND CODIGO = A.CODIGO AND DATAINCLUSAO <= ( SELECT DATAFINAL FROM ED_PERIODOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) ) ) ) AND A.EMPRESA = ( SELECT EMPRESA FROM ED_PERIODOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3232_at7195_hs41f50bf5.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>Lançamentos Contábeis>I200 - Lançamentos Contábeis>Enc
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_LANCAMENTOSCONTABEIS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.HANDLE FROM ED_PERIODOS PERIODO JOIN ED_LANCAMENTOSCONTABEIS LANCAMENTOCONTABIL ON (LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.PERIODO = PERIODO.HANDLE) WHERE PERIODO.HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) AND (LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.TIPO = 'E')) AND (A.PERIODO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3236_at5471_hs50f3b0eb.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>Lançamentos Contábeis>I200 - Lançamentos Contábeis>Nor
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_LANCAMENTOSCONTABEIS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.HANDLE FROM ED_PERIODOS PERIODO JOIN ED_LANCAMENTOSCONTABEIS LANCAMENTOCONTABIL ON (LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.PERIODO = PERIODO.HANDLE) WHERE PERIODO.HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) AND (LANCAMENTOCONTABIL.TIPO = 'N')) AND (A.PERIODO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3236_at5470_hs90fc7db2.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>Plano de Contas>I050 - Plano de Contas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes:
<SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_CONTAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT CONTA.HANDLE FROM ED_PERIODOS PERIODO JOIN ED_PARAMETROS PARAMETROECD ON PARAMETROECD.EMPRESA = PERIODO.EMPRESA JOIN CT_CONTASGERENCIAIS CONTAGERENCIAL ON CONTAGERENCIAL.PLANO = PARAMETROECD.PLANOCONTAS JOIN ED_CONTAS CONTA ON CONTA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL = CONTAGERENCIAL.HANDLE WHERE PERIODO.HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) AND ( ( CONTA.HANDLE = ( SELECT MAX(MAXCONTA.HANDLE) FROM ED_CONTAS MAXCONTA WHERE MAXCONTA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL = CONTA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL AND MAXCONTA.VERSAO = CONTA.VERSAO AND MAXCONTA.EMPRESA = CONTA.EMPRESA AND MAXCONTA.DATAINCLUSAO BETWEEN PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND PERIODO.DATAFINAL AND MAXCONTA.DATAINCLUSAO = ( SELECT MAX(MAXDATA.DATAINCLUSAO) FROM ED_CONTAS MAXDATA WHERE MAXDATA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL = MAXCONTA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL AND MAXDATA.VERSAO = MAXCONTA.VERSAO AND MAXDATA.EMPRESA = MAXCONTA.EMPRESA AND MAXDATA.DATAINCLUSAO BETWEEN PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND PERIODO.DATAFINAL ) ) ) OR ( CONTA.HANDLE = ( SELECT MAX(MAXCONTA.HANDLE) FROM ED_CONTAS MAXCONTA WHERE MAXCONTA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL = CONTA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL AND MAXCONTA.VERSAO = CONTA.VERSAO AND MAXCONTA.EMPRESA = CONTA.EMPRESA AND MAXCONTA.DATAINCLUSAO < PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND MAXCONTA.DATAINCLUSAO = ( SELECT MAX(MAXDATA.DATAINCLUSAO) FROM ED_CONTAS MAXDATA WHERE MAXDATA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL = MAXCONTA.ORIGEMCONTAGERENCIAL AND MAXDATA.VERSAO = MAXCONTA.VERSAO AND MAXDATA.EMPRESA = MAXCONTA.EMPRESA AND MAXDATA.DATAINCLUSAO < PERIODO.DATAINICIAL ) ) ) ) )
OR A.HANDLE IN (
SELECT CONTA.HANDLE FROM ED_PERIODOS PERIODO JOIN ED_PARAMETROS PARAMETROECD ON PARAMETROECD.EMPRESA = PERIODO.EMPRESA JOIN ED_CONTAS CONTA ON CONTA.VERSAO = PARAMETROECD.PLANOATIVO JOIN CT_CONTAS ORIGEM ON ORIGEM.HANDLE = CONTA.ORIGEMCONTA WHERE PERIODO.HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) AND ( ( CONTA.HANDLE = ( SELECT MAX(MAXCONTA.HANDLE) FROM ED_CONTAS MAXCONTA WHERE MAXCONTA.ORIGEMCONTA = CONTA.ORIGEMCONTA AND MAXCONTA.VERSAO = CONTA.VERSAO AND MAXCONTA.EMPRESA = CONTA.EMPRESA AND MAXCONTA.DATAINCLUSAO BETWEEN PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND PERIODO.DATAFINAL AND MAXCONTA.DATAINCLUSAO = ( SELECT MAX(MAXDATA.DATAINCLUSAO) FROM ED_CONTAS MAXDATA WHERE MAXDATA.ORIGEMCONTA = MAXCONTA.ORIGEMCONTA AND MAXDATA.VERSAO = MAXCONTA.VERSAO AND MAXDATA.EMPRESA = MAXCONTA.EMPRESA AND MAXDATA.DATAINCLUSAO BETWEEN PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND PERIODO.DATAFINAL ) ) ) OR ( CONTA.HANDLE = ( SELECT MAX(MAXCONTA.HANDLE) FROM ED_CONTAS MAXCONTA WHERE MAXCONTA.ORIGEMCONTA = CONTA.ORIGEMCONTA AND MAXCONTA.VERSAO = CONTA.VERSAO AND MAXCONTA.EMPRESA = CONTA.EMPRESA AND MAXCONTA.DATAINCLUSAO < PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND MAXCONTA.DATAINCLUSAO = ( SELECT MAX(MAXDATA.DATAINCLUSAO) FROM ED_CONTAS MAXDATA WHERE MAXDATA.ORIGEMCONTA = MAXCONTA.ORIGEMCONTA AND MAXDATA.VERSAO = MAXCONTA.VERSAO AND MAXDATA.EMPRESA = MAXCONTA.EMPRESA AND MAXDATA.DATAINCLUSAO < PERIODO.DATAINICIAL ) ) ) )
)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3229_at7196_hsc1acc6f1.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>Plano de Contas>I100 - Centro de Custo
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_CENTROSCUSTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT CENTROCUSTO.HANDLE FROM ED_CENTROSCUSTOS CENTROCUSTO WHERE CENTROCUSTO.EMPRESA = (SELECT EMPRESA FROM ED_PERIODOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS)) AND CENTROCUSTO.HANDLE IN (SELECT MAX(HANDLE) FROM ED_CENTROSCUSTOS WHERE EMPRESA = CENTROCUSTO.EMPRESA AND CODIGO = CENTROCUSTO.CODIGO AND DATAINCLUSAO = (SELECT MAX(DATAINCLUSAO) FROM ED_CENTROSCUSTOS WHERE DATAINCLUSAO <= (SELECT DATAFINAL FROM ED_PERIODOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS)) AND EMPRESA = CENTROCUSTO.EMPRESA AND CODIGO = CENTROCUSTO.CODIGO)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3233_at7197_hs71a81386.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>Saldo das Contas Antes do Encerramento>I350 - Saldo An
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_SALDOSCONTASRESULTADO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT SALDOCONTARESULTADO.HANDLE FROM ED_PERIODOS PERIODO JOIN ED_SALDOSCONTASRESULTADO SALDOCONTARESULTADO ON (SALDOCONTARESULTADO.EMPRESA = PERIODO.EMPRESA) WHERE SALDOCONTARESULTADO.DATA BETWEEN PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND PERIODO.DATAFINAL AND PERIODO.HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3240_at7198_hs9884ce6.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 3 - Escrituração Contábil>Saldos Periódicos>I150 - Saldos Periódicos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_SALDOSPERIODICOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT SALDOPERIODICO.HANDLE FROM ED_SALDOSPERIODICOS SALDOPERIODICO, ED_PERIODOS PERIODO WHERE PERIODO.EMPRESA = SALDOPERIODICO.EMPRESA AND PERIODO.HANDLE = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS) AND SALDOPERIODICO.DATAINICIAL >= PERIODO.DATAINICIAL AND SALDOPERIODICO.DATAFINAL <= PERIODO.DATAFINAL) AND (A.PERIODO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3234_at7199_hsaa2e6f9d.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: 4 - Signatários da escrituração>J930 - Signatários da escrituração
5 - Ident. Auditores Independentes>J935 - Auditores Independentes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_ED_AUDITORESINDEPENDENTES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.TERMOENCERRAMENTO IN ( SELECT B.HANDLE FROM ED_TERMOSENCERRAMENTO B WHERE B.PERIODO = @RASTRO(ED_PERIODOS)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t5358_at7830_hs85a4bc1a.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Histórico de Geração do Arquivo ECD
